subject: Where is my order?
description_text:
Hello,
  I received my pedal set, but not the haptic feedback sensors... The 
tracking information is giving me a message I don't understand.
Can you help me?

conversations.body_text: Hi Usdin. henri,    Here's another link for you. It's expected to arrive around the 13th.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047028210170
